titles.title: Emergency Support for Substance Use Disorder and Mental Health Services Act
Emergency Support for Substance Use Disorder and Mental Health Services Act

A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for the establishment or operation of a center to be known as the Emergency Mental Health and Substance Use Training and Technical Assistance Center.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary:
Emergency Support for Substance Use Disorder and Mental Health Services Act
This bill requires the Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration to provide technical assistance to certain organizations to expand access to and awareness of mental health and substance use prevention and treatment services during the COVID-19 (i.e., coronavirus disease 2019) emergency.
